answers.answer: Hello.Please see if you can achieve an adequate control of the blood sugar levels. Uncontrolled diabetes interferes with wound healing after surgery.You should avoid excessive movements of the neck, prevent any jerky movements and wear a cervical collar if you have been prescribed already.I would suggest you contact physical therapist for appropriate exercises.Regards
